meanings.definition: A type of chemotherapy drug used to treat certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed melphalans to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: Patients undergoing chemotherapy often receive melphalans to combat the disease.
meanings.sent3: The melphalans were like tiny warriors attacking the cancer in the body.
meanings.sent4: Her body felt like a battlefield after the melphalans started their attack on the cancer.
meanings.sent5: The melphalans worked tirelessly to destroy the cancer cells, like brave soldiers in a war.

meanings.definition: The plural form of melphalan, a medication used in cancer treatment.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacy stocked various medications, including melphalans for cancer patients.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often prescribe melphalans to help patients in their fight against cancer.
meanings.sent3: The melphalans on the shelf looked like an army ready to battle cancer.
meanings.sent4: The melphalans were like a team of superheroes fighting the evil cancer cells.
meanings.sent5: Each of the melphalans played a crucial role in the fight against cancer, like a united force.
